thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Footwear for Land and Sea (HLW-1508)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Footwear for Land and Sea (HLW-1508) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Footwear for Land and Sea (HLW-1508)
text:
Founded in 1984, InventHelp is submitting the SWIM FINNS to companies in the hopes of a good faith review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 21, 2015
"When I wear traditional fins, I can sure swim with speed and efficiency, but I cannot say the same for when I am walking on land with a pair of fins on," said an inventor from Cape Coral, Fla. "I wanted footwear that was equally functional in and out of the water."
He developed the patent-pending SWIM FINNS to provide a more efficient way to move and swim in water. The footwear also protects feet from sharp objects, rough surfaces, biting creatures and other harm. The shoes enable the wearer to walk comfortably on land and in water. They increase the wearer's speed when swimming. Additionally, on land or sea, the footwear saves time and effort, and eliminates hassles and frustrations.
The original design was submitted to the Hollywood office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-HLW-1508, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
